skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Discover the Word is a weekday Bible study featuring Mart DeHaan, Elisa Morgan, Bill Crowder, and Brian Hettinga. Enable the Discover the Word Alexa Skill to play, pause, and listen to their daily discussion.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
